text:
A small modification to concat_niimgs() to remove the call to np.concatenate(), which causes a lot of memory to be used. The proposed version uses less memory, for an similar execution time.

Some cleanup in docstrings has been made at the same time.
title: Reduced memory consumption for concat_niimgs

text:
A small modification to concat_niimgs() to remove the call to np.concatenate(), which causes a lot of memory to be used. The proposed version uses less memory, for an similar execution time.

Some cleanup in docstrings has been made at the same time.
title: Reduced memory consumption for concat_niimgs
Pull request merge from pgervais/nilearn:concat_optimization to nilearn/nilearn:master

text:
Optimized memory usage of concat_niimgs

Dropped usage of np.concatenate(), reducing memory usage by a factor
of 3. A test for inconsistent shapes has been added, with a clear user
error message.

Execution time of concat_niimgs() is similar, possibly slightly
shorter than for the previous version.
